item.title: Denyse add a quote by Denyse Bridger
item.description: "Decadent, rich chocolate; thick, silken, sweet cream; and the coolest breath of satin stroked over quivering skin... He was near..." -- Denyse Bridger

item.title: Denyse add a quote by Denyse Bridger
item.description:
"You want me, Bella. Why are we playing this game?”
Your voice is equal parts gravel and silk and I feel the question against my skin, pouring into my blood like an injection of heated desire." -- Denyse Bridger

item.title: Denyse add a quote by Denyse Bridger
Denyse add a quote by John O'Donohue
item.description: "Your soul knows the geography of your destiny. Your soul alone has the map of your future, therefore you can trust this indirect, oblique side of yourself. If you do, it will take you where you need to go, but more important it will teach you a kindness of rhythm in your journey." -- John O'Donohue

item.title: Denyse add a quote by Anna Bayes
item.description: "Being a writer brings out a sassy woman inside me, and I love her so." -- Anna Bayes
